level.heading: Standards of assistance adopted and applied.
level.text: Standards of assistance are adopted superseding the existing standards for requirements, and shall be applied:
To determine the eligibility of applicants for public assistance; and
To determine or redetermine the amount of public assistance grant for the recipient.
